Theory Phi_Types

chapter ‹Pre-built φ-Types›

theory Phi_Types
  imports IDE_CP_Reasoning2
begin

section ‹Basics›

subsection ‹Syntax Sugars›

text ‹Sometimes, we do not want to verbosely write a semantic type if it is known syntactically.
  We use syntax translation to achieve a sugar to do this.

This is a planning feature has not been implemented›

syntax TY_of_φ :: ‹('a,'b) φ ⇒ TY› ("TY'_of'_φ")

consts φcoercion :: ‹('c1,'a) φ ⇒ ('c2,'a) φ› ("\<coercion> _" [61] 60)
  ― ‹A syntax sugar to be overloaded!›

subsection ‹Identity›

definition Identity :: " ('a,'a) φ " where "Identity x = {x}"

lemma Identity_expn[φexpns]:
  "p ∈ (x ⦂ Identity) ⟷ p = x"
  unfolding φType_def Identity_def by auto

lemma Identity_inhabited[elim!,φinhabitance_rule]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ Identity) ⟹ C ⟹ C› .

lemma Identity_functional[φreason 1000]:
  ‹is_singleton (x ⦂ Identity)›
  by (rule is_singletonI''; simp add: φexpns)

lemma Identity_E[φreason 10]:
  ‹𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 v ∈ (x ⦂ T) ⟹ v ⦂ Identity 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x ⦂ T›
  unfolding Imply_def Premise_def by (simp add: φexpns)

(*lemma [simp]:
  ‹ v ∈ Well_Type TY
⟹ SemTyp_Of (v ⦂ Identity) = TY›
  unfolding φType_def Identity_def
  by (simp add: φSemType_def)*)

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹is_functional (v ⦂ Identity)›
  by (clarsimp simp add: Identity_expn)

lemma satisfication_encoding:
  ‹ (x ⦂ Identity 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ T 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P) ⟷ x ∈ (y ⦂ T) ∧ P›
  unfolding Imply_def Identity_expn by blast

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 v = v'
⟹ v ⦂ Identity 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 {v'}›
  unfolding Imply_def Identity_expn Premise_def by simp

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 v = v'
⟹ {v'} 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 v ⦂ Identity›
  unfolding Imply_def Identity_expn Premise_def by simp


subsection ‹Func›
 
definition φFun :: ‹('a ⇒ 'c) ⇒ ('c,'a) φ›
  where [φdefs]: ‹φFun f x = { f x }›

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 v = f x
⟹ v ⦂ Identity 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x ⦂ φFun f›
  ❴ constructφ ‹x ⦂ φFun f› ❵. .

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 f x = y
⟹ x ⦂ φFun f 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ Identity›
  ❴ destructφ _ ❵. .

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 f x = y
⟹ x ⦂ φFun f 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ Identity @action to Identity› ❴ ❵. .

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹is_functional (x ⦂ φFun f)›
  ❴ to Identity ❵. .


subsection ‹Any›

definition φAny :: ‹('x, unit) φ›
  where ‹φAny = (λ_. UNIV)›

lemma φAny_expns[φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ φAny)›
  unfolding φAny_def φType_def by simp

lemma φAny_inhabited[φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ φAny) ⟹ C ⟹ C›
  .

lemma φAny_cast [φreason 1200]:
  ‹X 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x ⦂ φAny›
  unfolding Imply_def by (simp add: φexpns)



subsection ‹Black Hole›

text ‹The system is a Classical Separation Logic.
  For some situation like garbage collection, Intuitionistic Separation Logic can be more convenient.
  Therefore, we employ a `Black Hole' which can contain arbitrary resources to simulate the
    Intuitionistic Separation Logic›

abbreviation Black_Hole :: ‹(FIC_N ⇒ FIC) set›
  where ‹Black_Hole ≡ UNIV›

lemma UNIV_subty [φreason 1000]:
  ‹X 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 UNIV›
  unfolding Imply_def by simp

lemma [φinhabitance_rule]:
  ‹Inhabited UNIV ⟹ C ⟹ C› .

subsection ‹Stepwise Abstraction›

definition φComposition :: ‹('v,'a) φ ⇒ ('a,'b) φ ⇒ ('v,'b) φ› (infixl "⨾" 30)
  where [φdefs]: ‹φComposition T U x = (y ⦂ T 𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 y. y ∈ (x ⦂ U))›
   
lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹x ⦂ T ⨾ U 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ T 𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 y. y ∈ (x ⦂ U) @action to RAW›
  ❴ destructφ _ thm useful  ❵. .

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ y ⦂ Identity 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ y ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x ⦂ T ⨾ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  ❴ premises Y[unfolded Imply_def Identity_expn, simplified, useful]
    constructφ ‹x ⦂ T ⨾ U› ❵. .

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ is_functional (x ⦂ U)
⟹ y ⦂ Identity 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ x ⦂ T ⨾ U 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ T 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  ❴ premises [unfolded is_functional_def, useful] and [unfolded satisfication_encoding, useful]
    D ❵. .

lemma φComposition_expn:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ T ⨾ U) ⟷ (∃y. p ∈ (y ⦂ T) ∧ y ∈ (x ⦂ U))›
  unfolding φComposition_def φType_def by (simp add: φexpns)

lemma φComposition_inhabited[elim,φinhabitance_rule]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ T ⨾ U) ⟹ (⋀y. Inhabited (x ⦂ U) ⟹ Inhabited (y ⦂ T) ⟹ C) ⟹ C›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns φComposition_expn) blast

lemma [φreason 1200 for ‹(_ ⦂ _ ⨾ _) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (_ ⦂ _ ⨾ _) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 _›]:
  ‹ x1 ⦂ U1 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x2 ⦂ U2 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ (x1 ⦂ T ⨾ U1) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x2 ⦂ T ⨾ U2) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  unfolding φComposition_expn Imply_def by blast


section ‹Logical Connectives›

subsection ‹Subjection as a Type›

definition SubjectionTY :: ‹('a,'b) φ ⇒ bool ⇒ ('a,'b) φ› (infixl "φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃" 25)
  where ‹ (T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P) = (λx. x ⦂ T 𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P) ›

translations "TY_of_φ (T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)" ⇀ "TY_of_φ T"

lemma SubjectionTY_expn[φprogramming_simps, φexpns]:
  ‹(x ⦂ T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P) = (x ⦂ T 𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)›
  unfolding set_eq_iff SubjectionTY_def φType_def by simp

lemma SubjectionTY_inhabited[φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P) ⟹ (P ⟹ Inhabited (x ⦂ T) ⟹ C) ⟹ C›
  unfolding SubjectionTY_expn using Subjection_inhabited .

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ Rewrite_into_φType S (x ⦂ T)
⟹ Rewrite_into_φType (S 𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P) (x ⦂ T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)›
  unfolding Rewrite_into_φType_def by (simp add: SubjectionTY_expn)

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ (𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 P ⟹ is_functional (x ⦂ T))
⟹ is_functional (x ⦂ T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)›
  ❴ premises [φreason add] ;; ❵. .

subsection ‹Existential Quantification as a Type›

definition ExTyp :: ‹('c ⇒ ('a, 'b) φ) ⇒ ('a, 'c ⇒ 'b)φ› (binder "∃φ" 10)
  where ‹ExTyp T = (λx. (∃*c. x c ⦂ T c))›

syntax
  "_SetcomprPhiTy" :: "'a ⇒ idts ⇒ bool ⇒ 'a set"  ("_ φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃/ _./ _ " [2,0,2] 2)
  "_SetcomprPhiTy'" :: "logic ⇒ idts ⇒ logic ⇒ logic"

parse_ast_translation ‹
  let open Ast
    fun idts_to_abs x (Appl [Constant "_idts", a, b]) = Appl [Constant "_abs", a, idts_to_abs x b]
      | idts_to_abs x c = Appl [Constant "_abs", c, x]
    fun parse_SetcomprPhiTy ctxt [Appl [Constant \<^const_syntax>‹φType›, x, T],idts,P] =
          Appl [Constant \<^const_syntax>‹φType›,
                idts_to_abs x idts,
                Appl [Constant "\<^const>Phi_Types.ExTyp_binder", idts,
                      (case P of (Appl [Constant "_constrain", Variable "True", _]) => T
                               | _ => Appl [Constant \<^const_name>‹SubjectionTY›, T, P])]]
      | parse_SetcomprPhiTy ctxt [X,idts,P] =
          Appl [Constant "\<^const>Phi_Types.ExTyp_binder", idts,
                (case P of (Appl [Constant "_constrain", Variable "True", _]) => X
                         | _ => Appl [Constant \<^const_name>‹SubjectionTY›, X, P])]
  in [(\<^syntax_const>‹_SetcomprPhiTy›, parse_SetcomprPhiTy)] end
›

(* TODO
term ‹x ⦂ (X a) φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 a b c. P a›

translations
  " _SetcomprPhiTy' x idts X" <= "x ⦂ (∃φ idts. X)"

print_ast_translation ‹
  [(\<^syntax_const>‹_SetcomprPhiTy'›, (fn _ => fn x => hd (@{print} x)))]
›

term ‹x ⦂ (X a) φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 a b c. P a›

*)

lemma ExTyp_expn[φexpns,φprogramming_simps]:
  ‹(x ⦂ ExTyp T) = (∃*a. x a ⦂ T a)›
  unfolding set_eq_iff ExTyp_def φType_def by (simp add: φexpns)

lemma ExTyp_inhabited[elim!, φinhabitance_rule]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ ExTyp T) ⟹ (Inhabited (∃*a. x a ⦂ T a) ⟹ C) ⟹ C›
  unfolding ExTyp_expn .

(* lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ P @action 𝒜nap (𝒜_structural (to Identity))
⟹ P @action 𝒜nap (to Identity)›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def . *)

lemma Action_to_Identity[φreason 30]:
  ‹X 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (v ⦂ Identity φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 v. v ∈ X) @action to Identity›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Imply_def by (simp add: φexpns)

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ (⋀a. Rewrite_into_φType (S a) (x a ⦂ T a))
⟹ Rewrite_into_φType (ExSet S) (x ⦂ ExTyp T)›
  unfolding Rewrite_into_φType_def by (simp add: ExTyp_expn, metis)


subsection ‹Inter›

definition φInter :: ‹('c,'ax) φ ⇒ ('c, 'bx) φ ⇒ ('c, 'ax × 'bx) φ› (infixl "∩⇩φ" 70)
  where ‹(T ∩⇩φ U) = (λ(x,y). (x ⦂ T) ∩ (y ⦂ U))›

lemma φInter_expn[φexpns]:
  ‹((x,y) ⦂ (T ∩⇩φ U)) = (x ⦂ T) ∩ (y ⦂ U)›
  unfolding set_eq_iff φType_def φInter_def by simp

lemma φInter_inhabited[φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited ((x,y) ⦂ (T ∩⇩φ U)) ⟹ (Inhabited (x ⦂ T) ⟹ Inhabited (y ⦂ U) ⟹ C) ⟹ C›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)


section ‹Structural Connectives›

subsection ‹None›

definition φNone :: ‹('v::one, unit) φ› ("○")
  where ‹φNone = (λx. { 1 }) ›

lemma φNone_expn[φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ φNone) ⟷ p = 1›
  unfolding φNone_def φType_def by simp

lemma φNone_inhabited[φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ φNone) ⟹ C ⟹ C› .

lemma φNone_itself_is_one[simp]:
  ‹(() ⦂ φNone) = 1›
  unfolding set_eq_iff by (simp add: φexpns)

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹() ⦂ φNone 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 1 ⦂ Identity›
  unfolding Imply_def φNone_expn Identity_expn by simp

subsubsection ‹Actions›

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ x ⦂ ○ 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x ⦂ ○ @action to Target ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using implies_refl .

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹() ⦂ φNone 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 1 ⦂ Identity @action to Identity› ❴ ❵. .

subsubsection ‹Rules›

lemma [φreason 3000]:
  ‹𝗋Clean (() ⦂ φNone)›
  unfolding 𝗋Clean_def by simp

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹is_functional (() ⦂ φNone)›
  ❴ to Identity ❵. .

subsection ‹Prod›

definition φProd :: " ('concrete::sep_magma, 'abs_a) φ ⇒ ('concrete, 'abs_b) φ ⇒ ('concrete, 'abs_a × 'abs_b) φ" (infixr "∗" 55)
  where "A ∗ B = (λ(a,b). B b * A a)"

lemma φProd_expn[φexpns]:
  "concrete ∈ ((a,b) ⦂ A ∗ B) ⟷ (∃cb ca. concrete = cb * ca ∧ cb ∈ (b ⦂ B) ∧ ca ∈ (a ⦂ A) ∧ cb ## ca)"
  unfolding φProd_def φType_def times_set_def by simp

lemma φProd_expn'[assertion_simps]:
  ‹((a,b) ⦂ A ∗ B) = (b ⦂ B) * (a ⦂ A)›
  unfolding set_eq_iff by (simp add: φexpns)

lemma φProd_inhabited[elim!,φinhabitance_rule]:
  "Inhabited ((x1,x2) ⦂ T1 ∗ T2) ⟹ (Inhabited (x1 ⦂ T1) ⟹ Inhabited (x2 ⦂ T2) ⟹ C) ⟹ C"
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns, blast)

(* lemma φProd_inhabited_expn[φinhabited]:
  ‹Inhabited ((x1,x2) ⦂ T1 ∗ T2) ⟷ Inhabited (x1 ⦂ T1) ∧ Inhabited (x2 ⦂ T2)›
  unfolding Inhabited_def apply (simp add: φexpns) *)

lemma φProd_split: "((a,b) ⦂ A ∗ B) = (b ⦂ B) * (a ⦂ A)"
  by (simp add: φexpns set_eq_iff)

lemma φProd_φNone:
  ‹((x',y) ⦂ ○ ∗ U) = ((y ⦂ U) :: 'a::sep_magma_1 set)›
  ‹((x,y') ⦂ T ∗ ○) = ((x ⦂ T) :: 'b::sep_magma_1 set)›
  unfolding set_eq_iff
  by (simp_all add: φexpns)

(*lemma (in φempty) SepNu_to_SepSet: "(OBJ (a,b) ⦂ A ∗ B) = (OBJ a ⦂ A) * (OBJ b ⦂ B)"
  by (simp add: φexpns set_eq_iff times_list_def) *)

subsubsection ‹Reasoning Rules›

(* paragraph ‹View Shift›

lemma [φreason for ‹(?x,?y) ⦂ ?N ∗ ?M 𝗌𝗁𝗂𝖿𝗍𝗌 (?x',?y') ⦂ ?N' ∗ ?M' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 ?P›]:
  " x ⦂ N 𝗌𝗁𝗂𝖿𝗍𝗌 x' ⦂ N' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P1
⟹ y ⦂ M 𝗌𝗁𝗂𝖿𝗍𝗌 y' ⦂ M' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P2
⟹ (x,y) ⦂ N ∗ M 𝗌𝗁𝗂𝖿𝗍𝗌 (x',y') ⦂ N' ∗ M' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P1 ∧ P2"
  unfolding View_Shift_def φProd_expn'
  by (smt (verit, best) mult.commute mult.left_commute)  *)

(*do not add it to φ-LPR because we have stronger reasoning mechanisms*)
lemma φProd_transformation:
  " x ⦂ N 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x' ⦂ N' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Pa
⟹ y ⦂ M 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y' ⦂ M' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Pb
⟹ (x,y) ⦂ N ∗ M 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x',y') ⦂ N' ∗ M' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Pa ∧ Pb"
  unfolding Imply_def by (simp add: φexpns) blast

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ 𝗋Clean (x ⦂ T)
⟹ 𝗋Clean (y ⦂ U)
⟹ 𝗋Clean ((x,y) ⦂ T ∗ U)›
  for T :: ‹('a::sep_magma_1, 'b) φ›
  unfolding 𝗋Clean_def φProd_expn' Imply_def
  apply (simp add: φexpns)
  using mult_1_class.mult_1_left by blast

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ is_functional (x ⦂ T)
⟹ is_functional (y ⦂ U)
⟹ is_functional ((x,y) ⦂ T ∗ U)›
  unfolding is_functional_def set_eq_iff
  by (simp add: φexpns, blast)


subsubsection ‹Action›

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ A 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 X 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural act
⟹ B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Q @action 𝒜_structural act
⟹ A * B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 X * Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P ∧ Q @action 𝒜_structural act›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (meson implies_left_prod implies_right_prod implies_trans)

lemma prod_transform_to1:
  ‹ A 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 X 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to T
⟹ B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Q @action to U
⟹ A * B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 X * Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P ∧ Q @action to (T ∗ U)›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (meson implies_left_prod implies_right_prod implies_trans)

lemma prod_transform_to2:
  ‹ A 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 X 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to U
⟹ B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Q @action to T
⟹ A * B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 X * Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P ∧ Q @action to (T ∗ U)›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (meson implies_left_prod implies_right_prod implies_trans)

declare [[φreason 1200 prod_transform_to1 prod_transform_to2
      for ‹?A * ?B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 _ 𝖺𝗇𝖽 _ @action to (?T ∗ ?U)›]]

hide_fact prod_transform_to1 prod_transform_to2

lemma [φreason 1100]:
  ‹ A 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 X 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to T
⟹ B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Q @action to T
⟹ A * B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 X * Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P ∧ Q @action to T›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (meson implies_left_prod implies_right_prod implies_trans)

lemma Prod_transform_to1:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x' ⦂ T' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to A
⟹ y ⦂ U 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y' ⦂ U' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Q @action to B
⟹ (x,y) ⦂ (T ∗ U) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x',y') ⦂ (T' ∗ U') 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P ∧ Q @action to (A ∗ B)›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  using φProd_transformation .

lemma Prod_transform_to2:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x' ⦂ T' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to B
⟹ y ⦂ U 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y' ⦂ U' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Q @action to A
⟹ (x,y) ⦂ (T ∗ U) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x',y') ⦂ (T' ∗ U') 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P ∧ Q @action to (A ∗ B)›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  using φProd_transformation .

declare [[φreason 1200 Prod_transform_to1 Prod_transform_to2
      for ‹(?x,?y) ⦂ (?T ∗ ?U) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 _ 𝖺𝗇𝖽 _ @action to (?A ∗ ?B)›]]

hide_fact Prod_transform_to1 Prod_transform_to2

lemma [φreason 1100]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x' ⦂ T' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Target
⟹ y ⦂ U 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y' ⦂ U' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Q @action to Target
⟹ (x,y) ⦂ (T ∗ U) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x',y') ⦂ (T' ∗ U') 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P ∧ Q @action to Target›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  using φProd_transformation .


lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ P @action as ((x ⦂ T) * (y ⦂ U))
⟹ P @action as ((x,y) ⦂ (T ∗ U)) ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def .

lemma prod_transform_as1:
  ‹ A 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 X 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as M
⟹ B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Q @action as N
⟹ A * B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 X * Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P ∧ Q @action as (M * N)›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (meson implies_left_prod implies_right_prod implies_trans)

lemma prod_transform_as2:
  ‹ A 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 X 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to N
⟹ B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Q @action to M
⟹ A * B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 X * Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P ∧ Q @action to (M * N)›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (meson implies_left_prod implies_right_prod implies_trans)

declare [[φreason 1200 prod_transform_as1 prod_transform_as2
      for ‹?A * ?B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 _ 𝖺𝗇𝖽 _ @action to (?M * ?N)›]]

hide_fact prod_transform_as1 prod_transform_as2

lemma [φreason 1100]:
  ‹ A 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 X 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as T
⟹ B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Q @action as T
⟹ A * B 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 X * Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P ∧ Q @action as T›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (meson implies_left_prod implies_right_prod implies_trans)

lemma Prod_transform_as1:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x' ⦂ T' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as A
⟹ y ⦂ U 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y' ⦂ U' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Q @action as B
⟹ (x,y) ⦂ (T ∗ U) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x',y') ⦂ (T' ∗ U') 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P ∧ Q @action as (A * B)›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  using φProd_transformation .

lemma Prod_transform_as2:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x' ⦂ T' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as B
⟹ y ⦂ U 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y' ⦂ U' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Q @action as A
⟹ (x,y) ⦂ (T ∗ U) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x',y') ⦂ (T' ∗ U') 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P ∧ Q @action as (A * B)›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  using φProd_transformation .

declare [[φreason 1200 Prod_transform_as1 Prod_transform_as2
      for ‹(?x,?y) ⦂ (?T ∗ ?U) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 _ 𝖺𝗇𝖽 _ @action as (?A * ?B)›]]

hide_fact Prod_transform_as1 Prod_transform_as2

lemma [φreason 1100]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x' ⦂ T' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as Target
⟹ y ⦂ U 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y' ⦂ U' 𝖺𝗇𝖽 Q @action as Target
⟹ (x,y) ⦂ (T ∗ U) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x',y') ⦂ (T' ∗ U') 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P ∧ Q @action as Target›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  using φProd_transformation .


paragraph ‹Simplification›

lemma φProd_simp_cong[folded atomize_eq]:
  ‹ (x ⦂ T) = (x' ⦂ T')
⟹ (y ⦂ U) = (y' ⦂ U')
⟹ ((x,y) ⦂ T ∗ U) = ((x',y') ⦂ T' ∗ U')›
  unfolding set_eq_iff by (simp add: φexpns)

simproc_setup φProd_simp_cong ("(x,y) ⦂ (T ∗ U)") = ‹
  K (fn ctxt => Phi_SimpCong.simproc @{thm φProd_simp_cong} ctxt)
›

lemma [simp]:
  ‹((x,y) ⦂ ExTyp T ∗ U) = ((λc. (x c, y)) ⦂ (∃φ c. T c ∗ U))›
  by (clarsimp simp add: set_eq_iff φexpns; blast)

lemma [simp]:
  ‹ NO_MATCH (ExTyp Any) T
⟹ ((x,y) ⦂ T ∗ ExTyp U) = ((λc. (x, y c)) ⦂ (∃φ c. T ∗ U c))›
  by (clarsimp simp add: set_eq_iff φexpns; blast)

subsection ‹List Item \& Empty List›

subsubsection ‹List Item›

definition List_Item :: ‹('v, 'a) φ ⇒ ('v list, 'a) φ›
  where ‹List_Item T = (λx. { [v] |v. v ∈ (x ⦂ T) })›

lemma List_Item_expn[φexpns]:
 ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ List_Item T) ⟷ (∃v. p = [v] ∧ v ∈ (x ⦂ T))›
  unfolding List_Item_def φType_def by simp

lemma List_Item_inhabited[φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ List_Item T) ⟹ (Inhabited (x ⦂ T) ⟹ C) ⟹ C›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns)

lemma ― ‹A example for how to represent multi-elements list›
  ‹ v1 ∈ (x1 ⦂ T1)
⟹ v2 ∈ (x2 ⦂ T2)
⟹ [v1,v2] ∈ ((x1, x2) ⦂ (List_Item T1 ∗ List_Item T2))›
  by (simp add: φexpns times_list_def, rule exI[where x=‹[v2]›], rule exI[where x=‹[v1]›], simp)

subsubsection ‹Empty List›

definition Empty_List :: ‹('v list, unit) φ›
  where ‹Empty_List = (λx. { [] })›

lemma [φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ Empty_List) ⟷ p = []›
  unfolding Empty_List_def φType_def by simp

lemma [φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ Empty_List) ⟹ C ⟹ C› .


subsection ‹Optional›

definition φOptional :: ‹('c,'x) φ ⇒ bool ⇒ ('c::one,'x) φ› (infix "?⇩φ" 55)
  where ‹(T ?⇩φ C) = (λx. if C then (x ⦂ T) else 1)›

lemma φOptional_expn[φexpns]:
  ‹(x ⦂ T ?⇩φ C) = (if C then x ⦂ T else 1)›
  unfolding φType_def φOptional_def by simp

lemma φOptional_inhabited[φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ T ?⇩φ C) ⟹ ((C ⟹ Inhabited (x ⦂ T)) ⟹ Z) ⟹ Z›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (cases C; clarsimp simp add: φexpns)

subsubsection ‹Conversion›

lemma [simp]:
  ‹(x ⦂ T ?⇩φ True) = (x ⦂ T)›
  unfolding set_eq_iff by (simp add: φOptional_expn)

lemma [simp]:
  ‹(x ⦂ T ?⇩φ False) = 1›
  unfolding set_eq_iff by (simp add: φOptional_expn)

subsubsection ‹Rules›

lemma [φreason 3000 for ‹𝗋Clean (?x ⦂ ?T ?⇩φ ?C)›]:
  ‹ 𝗋Clean (x ⦂ T ?⇩φ False) ›
  unfolding 𝗋Clean_def by simp



subsection ‹Mapping›

definition φMapping :: ‹('av,'a) φ ⇒ ('bv,'b) φ ⇒ ('av ⇒ 'bv, 'a ⇒ 'b) φ› (infixr "⇛" 25)
    ― ‹Forward Simulation›
  where ‹(T ⇛ U) = (λf. { g. ∀v x. v ∈ (x ⦂ T) ⟶ g v ∈ (f x ⦂ U) })›

lemma φMapping_expn[φexpns]:
  ‹g ∈ (f ⦂ T ⇛ U) ⟷ (∀v x. v ∈ (x ⦂ T) ⟶ g v ∈ (f x ⦂ U))›
  unfolding φMapping_def φType_def by simp

lemma φMapping_inhabited[φexpns]:
  ‹Inhabited (f ⦂ T ⇛ U) ⟹ ((⋀x. Inhabited (x ⦂ T) ⟹ Inhabited (f x ⦂ U)) ⟹ C) ⟹ C›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns, blast)


subsection ‹Point on a Mapping›

subsubsection ‹By Key›

definition φMapAt :: ‹'key ⇒ ('v::one, 'x) φ ⇒ ('key ⇒ 'v, 'x) φ› (infixr "❙→" 60)
  where ‹φMapAt key T x = { 1(key := v) |v. v ∈ (x ⦂ T) }›

lemma φMapAt_expns[φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ key ❙→ T) ⟷ (∃v. p = 1(key := v) ∧ v ∈ (x ⦂ T))›
  unfolding φMapAt_def φType_def by simp

lemma [φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ field ❙→ T) ⟹ (Inhabited (x ⦂ T) ⟹ C) ⟹ C›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns)

paragraph ‹Conversions›

lemma φMapAt_φProd:
  ‹k ❙→ (T ∗ U) = (k ❙→ T) ∗ (k ❙→ U)›
  for T :: ‹('a::sep_monoid,'b) φ›
  apply (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; rule; clarsimp)
  apply (metis fun_1upd_homo_right1 fun_sep_disj_1_fupdt(1))
  by (metis fun_1upd_homo_right1)

lemma φMapAt_φNone:
  ‹k ❙→ ○ = ○›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns)

(*
lemma [φreason 1500 for ‹?x ⦂ ?k ❙→ ○ 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 ?Y @action (?Act::?'a::simplification action)›]:
  ‹x ⦂ k ❙→ ○ 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 () ⦂ ○ @action Act›
  for Act :: ‹'a::simplification action›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (simp add: implies_refl φMapAt_φNone) *)

lemma φMapAt_simp_cong[folded atomize_eq]:
  ‹ (x ⦂ T) = (x' ⦂ T')
⟹ (x ⦂ k ❙→ T) = (x' ⦂ k ❙→ T')›
  unfolding set_eq_iff by (simp add: φexpns)

simproc_setup φMapAt_simp_cong ("(x ⦂ k ❙→ T)") = ‹
  K (fn ctxt => Phi_SimpCong.simproc @{thm φMapAt_simp_cong} ctxt)
›

paragraph ‹Implication \& Action rules›

lemma φMapAt_cast:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ x ⦂ k ❙→ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ k ❙→ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  unfolding Imply_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ 𝗋REQUIRE 𝗌𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆 k = k'
⟹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ x ⦂ k ❙→ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ k' ❙→ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  using φMapAt_cast by (simp add: Premise_def)

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act
⟹ x ⦂ k ❙→ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ k ❙→ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  using φMapAt_cast .

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z
⟹ x ⦂ k ❙→ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ k ❙→ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to (k' ❙→ Z) ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  using φMapAt_cast .

lemma [φreason 100]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z
⟹ x ⦂ k ❙→ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ k ❙→ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  using φMapAt_cast .

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as (z ⦂ Z)
⟹ x ⦂ k ❙→ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ k ❙→ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as (z ⦂ k' ❙→ Z) ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  using φMapAt_cast .

lemma [φreason 100]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as Z
⟹ x ⦂ k ❙→ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ k ❙→ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as Z ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  using φMapAt_cast .

lemma [simp]:
  ‹(k ❙→ ExTyp T) = (∃φ c. k ❙→ T c)›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

lemma [simp]:
  ‹(k ❙→ (T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)) = (k ❙→ T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ 𝗋Clean (x ⦂ T)
⟹ 𝗋Clean (x ⦂ k ❙→ T)›
  unfolding 𝗋Clean_def Imply_def
  apply (clarsimp simp add: φexpns)
  by (metis fun_1upd1)

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 k = k'
⟹ v ⦂ Identity 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 v' ⦂ T 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ 1(k := v) ⦂ Identity 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 v' ⦂ k' ❙→ T 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns Imply_def, blast)

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ is_functional (x ⦂ T)
⟹ is_functional (x ⦂ k ❙→ T)›
  by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns is_functional_def, blast)


subsubsection ‹By List of Keys›

definition φMapAt_L :: ‹'key list ⇒ ('key list ⇒ 'v::one, 'x) φ ⇒ ('key list ⇒ 'v, 'x) φ› (infixr "❙→⇩@" 60)
  where ‹φMapAt_L key T x = { push_map key v |v. v ∈ (x ⦂ T) }›

abbreviation φMapAt_L1 :: ‹'key ⇒ ('key list ⇒ 'v::one, 'x) φ ⇒ ('key list ⇒ 'v, 'x) φ› (infixr "❙→⇩#" 60)
  where ‹φMapAt_L1 key ≡ φMapAt_L [key]›

abbreviation φMapAt_Lnil :: ‹'key ⇒ ('v::one, 'x) φ ⇒ ('key list ⇒ 'v, 'x) φ› (infixr "❙→⇩[⇩]" 60)
  where ‹φMapAt_Lnil key T ≡ φMapAt_L [key] (φMapAt [] T)›

lemma φMapAt_L_expns[φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ T) ⟷ (∃v. p = push_map k v ∧ v ∈ (x ⦂ T))›
  unfolding φType_def φMapAt_L_def by simp

lemma φMapAt_L_inhabited[φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ T) ⟹ (Inhabited (x ⦂ T) ⟹ C) ⟹ C›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns)

paragraph ‹Conversion›

lemma φMapAt_L_φProd:
  ‹k ❙→⇩@ (T ∗ U) = (k ❙→⇩@ T) ∗ (k ❙→⇩@ U)›
  for T :: ‹('k list ⇒ 'a::sep_monoid,'b) φ›
  apply (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; rule)
  apply (clarsimp simp add: push_map_distrib_sep_mult[symmetric])
  using push_map_sep_disj apply blast
  apply (clarsimp simp add: push_map_distrib_sep_mult)
  by blast

lemma φMapAt_L_φMapAt:
  ‹k1 ❙→⇩@ k2 ❙→ T = k1 @ k2 ❙→ T›
  by (rule φType_eqI; simp add: φexpns; force)

lemma φMapAt_L_φMapAt_L:
  ‹k1 ❙→⇩@ k2 ❙→⇩@ T = k1 @ k2 ❙→⇩@ T›
  apply (rule φType_eqI; simp add: φexpns)
  by (metis push_map_push_map)

lemma φMapAt_L_φNone:
  ‹k ❙→⇩@ ○ = ○›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns)

(*
lemma [φreason for ‹?x ⦂ ?k ❙→⇩# ○ 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 ?X 𝖺𝗇𝖽 ?P @action (?Act::?'a::simplification action)›]:
  ‹x ⦂ k ❙→⇩# ○ 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 () ⦂ ○ @action Act›
  for Act :: ‹'a::simplification action›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def by (simp add: implies_refl φMapAt_L_φNone) *)

lemma φMapAt_L_simp_cong[folded atomize_eq]:
  ‹ (x ⦂ T) = (x' ⦂ T')
⟹ (x ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ T) = (x' ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ T')›
  unfolding set_eq_iff by (simp add: φexpns)

simproc_setup φMapAt_L_simp_cong ("x ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ T") = ‹
  K (fn ctxt => Phi_SimpCong.simproc @{thm φMapAt_L_simp_cong} ctxt)
›

lemma φMapAt_L_At:
  ‹(ks ❙→⇩@ [] ❙→ T) = (ks ❙→ T)›
  by (rule φType_eqI; simp add: φexpns; metis append_self_conv push_map_unit)

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ 𝗋Clean (x ⦂ T)
⟹ 𝗋Clean (x ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ T)›
  unfolding 𝗋Clean_def Imply_def
  apply (simp add: φexpns)
  using push_map_1 by blast



paragraph ‹Implication \& Action Rules›

lemma φMapAt_L_cast:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ x ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  unfolding Imply_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

lemma [φreason 1020]:
  ‹ 𝗋REQUIRE 𝗌𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆 k' = k
⟹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ x ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ k' ❙→⇩@ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  using φMapAt_L_cast by (simp add: Premise_def)

lemma [φreason 1017]:
  ‹ 𝗋REQUIRE
    𝗌𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆 length k < length k'
&&& 𝗌𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆 k @ kd = k'
⟹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ kd ❙→⇩@ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ x ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ k' ❙→⇩@ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  unfolding Imply_def 𝗋Require_def conjunction_imp
  apply (clarsimp simp add: φexpns)
  using push_map_push_map by blast

lemma [φreason 1013]:
  ‹ 𝗋REQUIRE
    𝗌𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆 length k' < length k
&&& 𝗌𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆 k @ kd = k'
⟹ x ⦂ kd ❙→⇩@ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ x ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ k' ❙→⇩@ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  unfolding Imply_def 𝗋Require_def conjunction_imp
  by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns)


lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act
⟹ x ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φMapAt_L_cast .

lemma [simp]:
  ‹(k ❙→⇩@ ExTyp T) = (∃φ c. k ❙→⇩@ T c)›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

lemma [simp]:
  ‹(k ❙→⇩@ (T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)) = (k ❙→⇩@ T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

(* subsection ‹Down Lifting› (*depreciated*)

definition DownLift :: "('a, 'b) φ ⇒ ('c ⇒ 'b) ⇒ ('a,'c) φ" (infixl "<down-lift>" 80)
  where "DownLift N g x = (g x ⦂ N)"

lemma DownLift_expn[simp]: " p ∈ (x ⦂ N <down-lift> g) ⟷ p ∈ (g x ⦂ N) "
  unfolding DownLift_def φType_def by simp

lemma [elim!,φinhabitance_rule]:
  "Inhabited (x ⦂ N <down-lift> g) ⟹ (Inhabited (g x ⦂ N) ⟹ C) ⟹ C"
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns)

(* lemma [φreason]: "𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 (g y = x) ⟹ x ⦂ M 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ M <down-lift> g"

subsection ‹Up Lifting› (*depreciated*)

definition UpLift :: "('a, 'c) φ ⇒ ('c ⇒ 'b) ⇒ ('a,'b) φ" (infixl "<up-lift>" 80)
  where "UpLift N f x = {p. (∃y. f y = x ∧ p ∈ (y ⦂ N))}"

lemma UpLift_expn[simp]:
  " p ∈ (x ⦂ N <up-lift> f) ⟷ (∃y. (f y = x) ∧ p ∈ (y ⦂ N))"
  unfolding UpLift_def φType_def by auto

lemma UpLift_inhabited[elim,φinhabitance_rule]:
  "Inhabited (x ⦂ N <up-lift> f) ⟹ (⋀y. f y = x ⟹ Inhabited (y ⦂ N) ⟹ C) ⟹ C"
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns) blast

lemma "↑lift_φapp":
  "𝗉𝖺𝗋𝖺𝗆 g ⟹ 𝗉𝖺𝗋𝖺𝗆 y ⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 y = g x ⟹ x ⦂ M 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ M <up-lift> g"
  unfolding Imply_def by (simp add: φexpns) blast

  unfolding Imply_def by (simp add: φexpns) blast *)

(* lemma [φreason]: "𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 y = g x ⟹ 𝗂𝗇❙t❙r❙o x ⦂ M 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ M <up-lift> g"

  unfolding Imply_def by (simp add: φexpns) blast

    ⟹ y ⦂ M <up-lift> g 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (∃*x. y' x ⦂ M' x) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 (∃x. y = g x ∧ P x)"
  unfolding Imply_def by (simp add: φexpns) blast

(*

  fun strip_constrain (Const ("_constrain", _) $ x $ _) = strip_constrain x

  fun name_of_Val (Const (\<^const_name>‹φType›, _) $ _ $ (Const (\<^const_name>‹Val›, _) $ v $ _ ))

                  |> dest_CurrentConstruction |> #4

       else error ("Referring a value that does not exists.")
    end

  fun has_get_val (Const (\<^const_name>‹φ__get_val›, _)) = true
    | has_get_val (A $ B) = has_get_val A orelse has_get_val B
    | has_get_val (Abs (_,_,X)) = has_get_val X

subsection ‹Semantic Type Annotation›

paragraph ‹Annotation for Single One›

definition Of_Type :: ‹(VAL,'a) φ ⇒ TY ⇒ (VAL,'a) φ› (infix "<of-type>" 23)
  where ‹(T <of-type> TY) = (λx. (x ⦂ T) ∩ Well_Type TY)›

lemma [φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ T <of-type> TY) ⟷ p ∈ (x ⦂ T) ∧ p ∈ Well_Type TY›
  unfolding Of_Type_def φType_def by (simp add: φexpns)

lemma [φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ T <of-type> TY) ⟹ (Inhabited (x ⦂ T) ⟹ C) ⟹ C ›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns) blast

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹φSemType (x ⦂ T <of-type> TY) TY›
  unfolding φSemType_def subset_iff by (simp add: φexpns)

lemma [φreason 100]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ φSemType (x ⦂ T) TY
⟹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U <of-type> TY 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  unfolding Imply_def φSemType_def by (simp add: φexpns) blast


paragraph ‹Annotation for a List›

definition Of_Types :: ‹(VAL list,'a) φ ⇒ TY list ⇒ (VAL list,'a) φ› (infix "<of-types>" 23)
  where ‹(T <of-types> TYs) = (λx. (x ⦂ T) ∩ {p. list_all2 (λv t. v ∈ Well_Type t) p TYs})›

lemma [φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ T <of-types> TYs) ⟷ p ∈ (x ⦂ T) ∧ list_all2 (λv t. v ∈ Well_Type t) p TYs›
  unfolding Of_Types_def φType_def by (simp add: φexpns)

lemma [φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ T <of-types> TYs) ⟹ (Inhabited (x ⦂ T) ⟹ C) ⟹ C ›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns) blast


section ‹Permission \& Share›

subsection ‹Share \& Option›

subsubsection ‹Definition of Properties›

definition φSep_Disj :: ‹('a::sep_disj,'b1) φ ⇒ ('a::sep_disj,'b2) φ ⇒ bool›
  where ‹φSep_Disj T U ⟷ (∀x y u v. u ∈ (x ⦂ T) ∧ v ∈ (y ⦂ U) ⟶ u ## v)›

definition φSep_Disj_Identical :: ‹('a::share_semimodule_sep, 'b) φ ⇒ bool›
  where ‹φSep_Disj_Identical T
    ⟷ (∀x u v. u ∈ (x ⦂ T) ∧ v ∈ (x ⦂ T) ∧ u ## v ⟶ u = v)
      ∧ (∀x u. u ∈ (x ⦂ T) ⟶ u ## u)›


subsubsection ‹Permission Functor›

definition φperm_ins_homo :: ‹('a::sep_algebra ⇒ 'b::share_module_sep) ⇒ ('a,'x) φ ⇒ ('b,'x) φ›
  where ‹φperm_ins_homo ψ T = (λx. { ψ v |v. v ∈ (x ⦂ T) ∧ perm_ins_homo ψ})›

abbreviation (in perm_ins_homo) ‹φ ≡ φperm_ins_homo ψ›

lemma φperm_ins_homo_expns[φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ T)
    ⟷ (∃v. p = ψ v ∧ v ∈ (x ⦂ T) ∧ perm_ins_homo ψ)›
  unfolding φperm_ins_homo_def φType_def by (simp add: φexpns)

lemma (in perm_ins_homo) [φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ φ T) ⟷ (∃v. p = ψ v ∧ v ∈ (x ⦂ T))›
  unfolding φperm_ins_homo_def φType_def by (simp add: φexpns perm_ins_homo_axioms)

lemma φperm_ins_homo_inhabited[φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ T) ⟹ (Inhabited (x ⦂ T) ⟹ C) ⟹ C›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns; blast)

paragraph ‹Implication›

lemma φperm_ins_homo_cast[φreason 2000]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ x ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  unfolding Imply_def by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

paragraph ‹Action›

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act
⟹ x ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φperm_ins_homo_cast .

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z
⟹ x ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φperm_ins_homo_cast .

lemma [φreason 1100]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z
⟹ x ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to (φperm_ins_homo ψ Z) ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φperm_ins_homo_cast .

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as Z
⟹ x ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as Z ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φperm_ins_homo_cast .

lemma [φreason 1100]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as (z ⦂ Z)
⟹ x ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as (z ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ Z) ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φperm_ins_homo_cast .



paragraph ‹Simplification›

lemma [simp]:
  ‹(φperm_ins_homo ψ (ExTyp T)) = (∃φ c. φperm_ins_homo ψ (T c))›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

lemma [simp]:
  ‹(φperm_ins_homo ψ (T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)) = (φperm_ins_homo ψ T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

lemma φperm_ins_homo_simp_cong[folded atomize_eq]:
  ‹ (x ⦂ T) = (x' ⦂ T')
⟹ (x ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ T) = (x' ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ T')›
  unfolding set_eq_iff by (simp add: φexpns)

simproc_setup φperm_ins_homo_simp_cong ("x ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ T") = ‹
  K (fn ctxt => Phi_SimpCong.simproc @{thm φperm_ins_homo_simp_cong} ctxt)
›


lemma φperm_ins_homo_φNone:
  assumes prem: ‹perm_ins_homo ψ›
  shows ‹φperm_ins_homo ψ ○ = ○›
proof -
  interpret perm_ins_homo ψ using prem .
  show ‹φ ○ = ○›
    by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns perm_ins_homo_axioms)
qed

(* lemma [φreason 1500 for ‹?x ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ?ψ ○ 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 ?X 𝖺𝗇𝖽 ?P @action (?Act::?'a::simplification action)›]:
  ‹x ⦂ φperm_ins_homo ψ ○ 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x ⦂ ○ @action Act›
  for Act :: ‹'a::simplification action›
  unfolding Imply_def Action_Tag_def
  apply (clarsimp simp add: φexpns)
  using inj_at_1_def perm_ins_homo'.axioms(5) by blast *)

lemma φperm_ins_homo_MapAt:
  ‹φperm_ins_homo ((o) f) (k ❙→ T) = (k ❙→ φperm_ins_homo f T)›
proof (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns φperm_ins_homo_expns
            perm_ins_homo_pointwise_eq; rule; clarsimp)
  fix x :: 'a and va :: 'd
  assume ‹perm_ins_homo f›
  then interpret perm_ins_homo f .
  show ‹va ∈ (x ⦂ T) ⟹ ∃v. f ∘ 1(k := va) = 1(k := v) ∧ (∃va. v = f va ∧ va ∈ (x ⦂ T))› by fastforce
  show ‹va ∈ (x ⦂ T) ⟹ ∃v. 1(k := f va) = f ∘ v ∧ (∃va. v = 1(k := va) ∧ va ∈ (x ⦂ T))›
    by (metis ‹va ∈ (x ⦂ T) ⟹ ∃v. f ∘ 1(k := va) = 1(k := v) ∧ (∃va. v = f va ∧ va ∈ (x ⦂ T))› comp_def fun_upd_same)
qed

lemma φperm_ins_homo_MapAt_L:
  ‹φperm_ins_homo ((o) f) (k ❙→⇩@ T) = (k ❙→⇩@ φperm_ins_homo ((o) f) T)›
proof (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns φperm_ins_homo_expns
            perm_ins_homo_pointwise_eq; rule; clarsimp)
  fix x :: 'a and va :: ‹'b list ⇒ 'd›
  assume ‹perm_ins_homo f›
  then interpret perm_ins_homo f .
  show ‹va ∈ (x ⦂ T) ⟹ ∃v. f ∘ k ▸⇩m va = k ▸⇩m v ∧ (∃va. v = f ∘ va ∧ va ∈ (x ⦂ T))›
    using push_map_homo by blast
  show ‹va ∈ (x ⦂ T) ⟹ ∃v. k ▸⇩m (f ∘ va) = f ∘ v ∧ (∃va. v = k ▸⇩m va ∧ va ∈ (x ⦂ T))›
    by (metis push_map_homo)
qed    


lemma φperm_ins_homo_Prod_imply:
  ‹x ⦂ φperm_ins_homo f (T ∗ U) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x ⦂ (φperm_ins_homo f T) ∗ (φperm_ins_homo f U)›
  unfolding Imply_def
  apply (cases x; clarsimp simp add: φexpns φSep_Disj_def)
  by (metis homo_sep_def homo_sep_disj_semi_def homo_sep_mult_def homo_sep_wand_1_def homo_sep_wand_def homo_sep_wand_monoid_def perm_ins_homo_def)

lemma φperm_ins_homo_Prod:
  ‹ φSep_Disj T U
⟹ φperm_ins_homo f (T ∗ U) = (φperm_ins_homo f T) ∗ (φperm_ins_homo f U)›
  apply (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns φSep_Disj_def; rule; clarsimp)
  apply (metis homo_sep_def homo_sep_disj_semi_def homo_sep_mult_def homo_sep_wand_1_def homo_sep_wand_def homo_sep_wand_monoid_def perm_ins_homo_def)
  by (metis homo_sep_wand.homo_sep_wand homo_sep_wand_1_def homo_sep_wand_monoid_def perm_ins_homo_def sep_disj_commute)


subsubsection ‹Permission Annotation›

definition φShare :: ‹rat ⇒ ('v::share,'x) φ ⇒ ('v, 'x) φ› (infixr "⩥" 60)
  where ‹φShare n T = (λx. { share n v |v. v ∈ (x ⦂ T) ∧ 0 < n }) ›

lemma φShare_expn[φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ n ⩥ T) ⟷ (∃v. p = share n v ∧ v ∈ (x ⦂ T) ∧ 0 < n )›
  unfolding φShare_def φType_def by simp

lemma φShare_inhabited[φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ n ⩥ T) ⟹ (Inhabited (x ⦂ T) ⟹ 0 < n ⟹ C) ⟹ C›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns)

subparagraph ‹Auxiliary Tag›

definition half :: ‹rat ⇒ rat› where [iff]: ‹half x = x›

text ‹Many read-only applicable rules require only non-zero permissions.
  It is reflected as arbitrary schematic variable in the rule, like
    \<^schematic_prop>‹ x ⦂ ?n ⩥ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 ?Z›.
  As arbitrary schematic variable, the reasoner may by mistake instantiate it to be the total
  permission. It is not the optimal, and it is better to only assign a half of the permission
    and to leave the remain half to be used potentially later.
  For example, if a rule requires twice the same resource,
    \<^schematic_prop>‹ (x ⦂ ?n ⩥ T) * (x ⦂ ?m ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 ?Z›.
  The best solution is to assign ?n by a half of the current permission and then assign ?m
    the half of the remaining half.

  Unfortunately, the reasoner can hardly be configured to apply this conservative policy, because
  schematic variables have a semantics of accepting any instantiation and there are many short-cut
  reasoning rule trying to solve greedily a local problem by unification.

  An approach is, if a rule may request a same object by twice, add the tag \<^term>‹half› on its
    permission to tell explicitly the reasoner to only assign it a half of the permission.
    \<^schematic_prop>‹ (x ⦂ half ?n ⩥ T) * (x ⦂ half ?m ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 ?Z›.
›

paragraph ‹Structural Conversions›

lemma φShare_1[simp]:
  ‹ (1 ⩥ T) = T ›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns)

lemma φShare_φShare[simp]:
  ‹ 0 < n ∧ 0 < m
⟹ n ⩥ m ⩥ T = n*m ⩥ T ›
  apply (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns)
  by (metis share_share_not0)

lemma φShare_share:
  ‹ 0 < n ∧ 0 < m
⟹ φSep_Disj_Identical T
⟹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ T) * (x ⦂ m ⩥ T) = (x ⦂ n+m ⩥ T)›
  for T :: ‹('a::share_semimodule_sep,'b) φ›
  unfolding φSep_Disj_Identical_def
  apply (clarsimp simp add: φexpns set_eq_iff; rule; clarsimp)
  using share_sep_left_distrib_0 apply blast
  subgoal for v
  apply (rule exI[where x=‹share n v›], rule exI[where x=‹share m v›], simp)
    by (metis share_sep_left_distrib_0) .

lemma φShare_φMapAt:
  ‹n ⩥ k ❙→ T = k ❙→ n ⩥ T›
  for T :: ‹('a::share_one,'b) φ›
  apply (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; rule; clarsimp)
  apply blast
  by (metis share_fun_updt share_right_one)

lemma φShare_φMapAt_L:
  ‹n ⩥ k ❙→⇩@ T = k ❙→⇩@ n ⩥ T›
  for T :: ‹('k list ⇒ 'a::share_one,'b) φ›
  apply (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; rule)
  apply (clarsimp simp add: share_push_map) apply blast
  apply (clarsimp simp add: share_push_map[symmetric]) by blast

lemma φShare_φProd:
  ‹n ⩥ (T ∗ U) = (n ⩥ T) ∗ (n ⩥ U)›
  for T :: ‹('a::share_semimodule_sep, 'b) φ›
  apply (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; rule; clarsimp)
  apply (metis share_sep_disj_left share_sep_disj_right share_sep_right_distrib_0)
  using share_sep_right_distrib_0 by blast

lemma φShare_φNone:
  ‹0 < n ⟹ n ⩥ ○ = (○ :: ('a::share_one,unit) φ)›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns)

lemma [φreason 1500 for ‹?x ⦂ ?n ⩥ ○ 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 ?Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 ?P @action (?Act::?'b::simplification action)›]:
  ‹x ⦂ n ⩥ ○ 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x ⦂ (○ :: ('a::share_one,unit) φ) @action Act›
  for Act :: ‹'b::simplification action›

paragraph ‹Implication \& Action Rules›

lemma φShare_transformation:
  ‹ (x ⦂ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (y ⦂ U) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (y ⦂ n ⩥ U) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  unfolding Imply_def by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

lemma [φreason 1010]:
  ‹ (x ⦂ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (y ⦂ U) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 n = n'
⟹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (y ⦂ n' ⩥ U) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  using φShare_transformation by (simp add: Premise_def)

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ (x ⦂ n * m ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 0 < n ∧ 0 < m
⟹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ m ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  unfolding Premise_def by simp

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ X 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x ⦂ n * m ⩥ T) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 0 < n ∧ 0 < m
⟹ X 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x ⦂ n ⩥ m ⩥ T) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  for T :: ‹('a::share_semimodule_sep,'b) φ›
  unfolding Premise_def by simp

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ (x ⦂ k ❙→ n ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ k ❙→ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  for T :: ‹('a::share_one,'b) φ›
  unfolding φShare_φMapAt .

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ X 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x ⦂ k ❙→ n ⩥ T) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ X 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x ⦂ n ⩥ k ❙→ T) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  for T :: ‹('a::share_one,'b) φ›
  unfolding φShare_φMapAt .

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ (x ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ n ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ k ❙→⇩@ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  for T :: ‹('k list ⇒ 'a::share_one, 'b) φ›

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ X 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x ⦂ k ❙→⇩@ n ⩥ T) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ X 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x ⦂ n ⩥ k ❙→⇩@ T) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  for T :: ‹('k list ⇒ 'a::share_one, 'b) φ›

  ‹ X 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x ⦂ n ⩥ T ∗ n ⩥ U) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ X 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x ⦂ n ⩥ (T ∗ U)) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  for T :: ‹('a::share_semimodule_sep,'b) φ›
  unfolding φShare_φProd .

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ T ∗ n ⩥ U) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ (T ∗ U)) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 Y 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  for T :: ‹('a::share_semimodule_sep,'b) φ›
  unfolding φShare_φProd .

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ 𝗋Clean (x ⦂ T)
⟹ 𝗋Clean (x ⦂ n ⩥ T)›
  for T :: ‹('a::share_semimodule_mult, 'b) φ›
  unfolding 𝗋Clean_def Imply_def apply (simp add: φexpns)
  using share_right_one by blast


paragraph ‹Action Rules›

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ (x ⦂ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (y ⦂ U) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act
⟹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (y ⦂ n ⩥ U) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φShare_transformation .

  ‹ (x ⦂ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (y ⦂ U) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z
⟹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (y ⦂ n ⩥ U) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φShare_transformation .

⟹ (x ⦂ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (y ⦂ U) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z
⟹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (y ⦂ n ⩥ U) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to (n' ⩥ Z)›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φShare_transformation .

lemma [φreason 1000]:

⟹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (y ⦂ n ⩥ U) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as Z›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φShare_transformation .

⟹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (y ⦂ n ⩥ U) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as (z ⦂ n' ⩥ Z)›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φShare_transformation .

  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

  ‹ (x ⦂ T) = (x' ⦂ T')
⟹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ T) = (x' ⦂ n ⩥ T')›
  unfolding set_eq_iff by (simp add: φexpns)

subparagraph ‹Permission›

lemma share_split_φapp:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 0 < n ∧ 0 < m
⟹ φSep_Disj_Identical T
⟹ (x ⦂ n+m ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x ⦂ n ⩥ T) * (x ⦂ m ⩥ T)›
  for T :: ‹('a::share_semimodule_sep,'b) φ›
  by (simp add: φShare_share implies_refl Premise_def)

lemma share_merge_φapp:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 0 < n ∧ 0 < m
⟹ φSep_Disj_Identical T
⟹ (x ⦂ n ⩥ T) * (x ⦂ m ⩥ T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x ⦂ n+m ⩥ T)›
  for T :: ‹('a::share_semimodule_sep,'b) φ›
  by (simp add: φShare_share implies_refl Premise_def)


subsubsection ‹φ-Some›

definition φSome :: ‹('v, 'x) φ ⇒ ('v option, 'x) φ› ("● _" [91] 90)
  where ‹φSome T = (λx. { Some v |v. v ∈ (x ⦂ T) })›

abbreviation φShare_Some ("◉ _" [91] 90)
  where ‹φShare_Some T ≡ φperm_ins_homo to_share (φSome T)›

abbreviation φShare_Some_L ("◉⇩L _" [91] 90)
  where ‹φShare_Some_L T ≡ [] ❙→ φperm_ins_homo to_share (φSome T)›

φadhoc_overloading φcoercion φSome φShare_Some φShare_Some_L

lemma φSome_expn[φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ φSome T) ⟷ (∃v. p = Some v ∧ v ∈ (x ⦂ T))›
  unfolding φType_def φSome_def by simp

lemma φSome_inhabited[φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ φSome T) ⟹ (Inhabited (x ⦂ T) ⟹ C) ⟹ C›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns)

paragraph ‹Implication \& Action Rules›

lemma φSome_cast[φreason 2000]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ x ⦂ ● T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ ● U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  unfolding Imply_def by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns)

lemma [φreason 2000]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act
⟹ x ⦂ ● T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ ● U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φSome_cast .

lemma [φreason 1070]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z
⟹ x ⦂ ● T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ ● U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φSome_cast .

⟹ x ⦂ ● T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ ● U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to (● Z) ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φSome_cast .

⟹ x ⦂ ● T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ ● U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as (z ⦂ Z) ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φSome_cast .

lemma [φreason 1100]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as (z ⦂ Z)
⟹ x ⦂ ● T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ ● U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as (z ⦂ ● Z) ›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φSome_cast .


lemma [simp]:
  ‹(● ExTyp T) = (∃φ c. ● T c)›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

lemma [simp]:
  ‹(● (T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)) = (● T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

lemma φSome_simp_cong[folded atomize_eq]:
  ‹ (x ⦂ T) = (x' ⦂ T')
⟹ (x ⦂ ● T) = (x' ⦂ ● T')›
  unfolding set_eq_iff by (simp add: φexpns)

simproc_setup φSome_simp_cong ("x ⦂ ● T") = ‹
  K (fn ctxt => Phi_SimpCong.simproc @{thm φSome_simp_cong} ctxt)
›

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ v ⦂ Identity 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 v' ⦂ T 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ Some v ⦂ Identity 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 v' ⦂ ● T 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns Imply_def)

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ is_functional (x ⦂ T)
⟹ is_functional (x ⦂ ● T)›
  by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns is_functional_def)

subsection ‹Agreement›

definition Agreement :: ‹('T, 'x) φ ⇒ ('T agree option, 'x) φ›
  where ‹Agreement T x = { Some (agree v) |v. v ∈ (x ⦂ T) }›

lemma Agreement_expns[φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ Agreement T) ⟷ (∃v. p = Some (agree v) ∧ v ∈ (x ⦂ T))›
  unfolding φType_def Agreement_def by simp

lemma Agreement_inhabited[φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ Agreement T) ⟹ (Inhabited (x ⦂ T) ⟹ C) ⟹ C›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns)

lemma Agreement_times:
  ‹(w ⦂ Agreement W) * (x ⦂ Agreement T) = ((w,x) ⦂ Agreement (W ∩⇩φ T))›
  unfolding set_eq_iff
  apply (clarsimp simp add: φexpns; rule; clarsimp)
  subgoal for v
    by (rule exI[where x=‹Some (agree v)›]; rule exI[where x=‹Some (agree v)›]; simp) .

paragraph ‹Conversion›

lemma [simp]:
  ‹Agreement (T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P) = (Agreement T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

lemma [simp]:
  ‹Agreement (ExTyp T) = (∃φc. Agreement (T c))›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

paragraph ‹Rule›

lemma Agreement_cast[φreason 2000]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ x ⦂ Agreement T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ Agreement U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  unfolding Imply_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns)

lemma Agreement_dup[
  φreason 1200 for ‹?x ⦂ Agreement ?T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 ?U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 ?P @action action_dup›,
  unfolded Action_Tag_def,
  φreason for ‹?x ⦂ Agreement ?T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (?x ⦂ Agreement ?T) * (?x ⦂ Agreement ?T) 𝖺𝗇𝖽 ?P›
]:
  ‹ x ⦂ Agreement T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 (x ⦂ Agreement T) * (x ⦂ Agreement T) @action action_dup›
  unfolding Imply_def Action_Tag_def
  apply (clarsimp simp add: φexpns)
  subgoal for v by (rule exI[where x=‹Some (agree v)›]; rule exI[where x=‹Some (agree v)›]; simp) .

lemma Agreement_shrink[
  φreason 1200 for ‹(?x ⦂ Agreement ?T) * (?x ⦂ Agreement ?T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 ?U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 ?P @action action_shrink›,
  unfolded Action_Tag_def,
  φreason for ‹(?x ⦂ Agreement ?T) * (?x ⦂ Agreement ?T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 ?x ⦂ Agreement ?T 𝖺𝗇𝖽 ?P›
]:
  ‹ (x ⦂ Agreement T) * (x ⦂ Agreement T) 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 x ⦂ Agreement T @action action_shrink ›
  unfolding Imply_def Action_Tag_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns)


lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act
⟹ x ⦂ Agreement T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ Agreement U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using Agreement_cast .

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z
⟹ x ⦂ Agreement T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ Agreement U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using Agreement_cast .

lemma [φreason 1100]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z
⟹ x ⦂ Agreement T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ Agreement U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to (Agreement Z)›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using Agreement_cast .

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as Z
⟹ x ⦂ Agreement T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ Agreement U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as Z›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using Agreement_cast .

lemma [φreason 1100]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as (z ⦂ Z)
⟹ x ⦂ Agreement T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ Agreement U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as (z ⦂ Agreement Z)›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using Agreement_cast .


subsection ‹Nosep›

definition Nosep :: ‹('T, 'x) φ ⇒ ('T nosep, 'x) φ›
  where ‹Nosep T x = nosep ` (x ⦂ T)›

φadhoc_overloading φcoercion ‹λT. ● Nosep T› ‹λT. ◉ Nosep T› ‹λT. ◉⇩L Nosep T›

(*TODO: give a configure flag to control this sugar*)
translations
  "\<coercion> T" <= "◉ CONST Nosep T"

lemma Nosep_expns[φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ Nosep T) ⟷ (∃v. p = nosep v ∧ v ∈ (x ⦂ T))›
  unfolding φType_def Nosep_def by blast

lemma Nosep_inhabited[φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ Nosep T) ⟹ (Inhabited (x ⦂ T) ⟹ C) ⟹ C›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns)

paragraph ‹Conversion›

lemma [simp]:
  ‹Nosep (T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P) = (Nosep T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)

lemma [simp]:
  ‹Nosep (ExTyp T) = (∃φc. Nosep (T c))›
  by (rule φType_eqI; clarsimp simp add: φexpns; blast)


paragraph ‹Rule›

⟹ x ⦂ Nosep T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ Nosep U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  unfolding Imply_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns)

lemma [φreason 2000]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act
⟹ x ⦂ Nosep T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ Nosep U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using Nosep_cast .

lemma [φreason 2000]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z
⟹ x ⦂ Nosep T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ Nosep U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using Nosep_cast .

lemma [φreason 1100]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z
⟹ x ⦂ Nosep T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ Nosep U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to (Nosep Z)›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using Nosep_cast .

lemma [φreason 1000]:

⟹ x ⦂ Nosep T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ Nosep U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as Z›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using Nosep_cast .

lemma [φreason 1100]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action as (z ⦂ Z)

section ‹Specifc Structures›

subsection ‹Potentially Uninitialized Structure›

datatype 'V uninit = initialized 'V | uninitialized

instantiation uninit :: (nonsepable_semigroup) nonsepable_semigroup begin
definition ‹sep_disj_uninit (x::'a uninit) (y::'a uninit) ⟷ False›
instance apply standard unfolding sep_disj_uninit_def by simp_all
end

paragraph ‹Definition›

text ‹φMayInit T relates a value with T if the value is initialized; or if not, it relates the zero
  value of that type with T.›

definition φMayInit :: ‹TY ⇒ (VAL, 'x) φ ⇒ (VAL uninit, 'x) φ›
  where ‹φMayInit TY T x = ({uninitialized} 𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 (∃z. Zero TY = Some z ∧ z ∈ (x ⦂ T))) + initialized ` (x ⦂ T <of-type> TY)›

(* abbreviation φShare_Some_Init ("◉⟦_⟧ _" [0, 91] 90)
  where ‹φShare_Some_Init TY T ≡ ◉ φMayInit TY T› *)

lemma φMayInit_expn[φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ φMayInit TY T) ⟷ (p = uninitialized ∧ (∃z. Zero TY = Some z ∧ z ∈ (x ⦂ T)) ∨ (∃v. p = initialized v ∧ v ∈ (x ⦂ T <of-type> TY)))›
  unfolding φType_def φMayInit_def by (simp add: φexpns, blast)

lemma φMayInit_inhabited[φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ φMayInit TY T) ⟹ (Inhabited (x ⦂ T) ⟹ C) ⟹ C›
  unfolding Inhabited_def by (simp add: φexpns, blast)

paragraph ‹Conversions›

lemma [simp]:
  ‹φMayInit TY (T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P) = (φMayInit TY T φ𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 P)›
  by (rule φType_eqI; simp add: φexpns; blast)

lemma [simp]:
  ‹φMayInit TY (ExTyp T) = (∃φ c. φMayInit TY (T c))›
  by (rule φType_eqI; simp add: φexpns; blast)

paragraph ‹Rules›

(*TODO: improve this*)
lemma φMayInit_cast[φreason for ‹?x ⦂ φMayInit ?TY ?T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 ?y ⦂ φMayInit ?TY' ?U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 ?P›]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P
⟹ x ⦂ φMayInit TY T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ φMayInit TY U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P›
  unfolding Imply_def by (clarsimp simp add: φexpns; rule; clarsimp)

lemma [φreason 1200]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act
⟹ x ⦂ φMayInit TY T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ φMayInit TY U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action 𝒜_structural Act›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φMayInit_cast .

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  ‹ x ⦂ T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z
⟹ x ⦂ φMayInit TY T 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖾𝗌 y ⦂ φMayInit TY U 𝖺𝗇𝖽 P @action to Z›
  unfolding Action_Tag_def using φMayInit_cast .


definition φUninit :: ‹('v uninit, unit) φ›
  where ‹φUninit x = {uninitialized}›

lemma φUninit_expn[φexpns]:
  ‹p ∈ (x ⦂ φUninit) ⟷ p = uninitialized›
  unfolding φType_def φUninit_def by simp

lemma φUninit_inhabited[φinhabitance_rule, elim!]:
  ‹Inhabited (x ⦂ φUninit) ⟹ C ⟹ C› .


section ‹Misc.›

subsection ‹Forward Simulation›

definition φF_simulation
    :: ‹('av,'a) φ ⇒ ('bv,'b) φ ⇒ (('av × 'bv) set, ('a × 'b) set) φ› (infixr "⇛⇩r" 25)
    ― ‹Forward Simulation›
  where ‹(T ⇛⇩r U) = (λf. { g. ∀v x. v ∈ (x ⦂ T) ⟶ (∃u y. (v,u) ∈ g ∧ (x,y) ∈ f ∧ u ∈ (y ⦂ U)) })›

end
